{
  "name": "@voiceassist/root",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "description": "VoiceAssist Enterprise Medical AI Assistant - Monorepo",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "turbo run dev",
    "build": "turbo run build",
    "test": "turbo run test",
    "test:fast": "turbo run test:fast --concurrency=1",
    "test:web": "pnpm --filter voiceassist-web test:fast",
    "test:ui": "pnpm --filter @voiceassist/ui test:fast",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:e2e:debug": "playwright test --debug",
    "test:e2e:report": "playwright show-report",
    "test:e2e:voice": "LIVE_REALTIME_E2E=1 playwright test --project=voice-live",
    "test:e2e:voice:mobile": "LIVE_REALTIME_E2E=1 playwright test --project=voice-mobile-iphone --project=voice-mobile-pixel",
    "test:e2e:voice:all": "LIVE_REALTIME_E2E=1 playwright test --project=voice-live --project=voice-mobile-iphone --project=voice-mobile-pixel",
    "generate:e2e": "node scripts/generate-e2e-tests.js",
    "lint": "turbo run lint",
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}\"",
    "type-check": "turbo run type-check",
    "clean": "turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules .turbo",
    "storybook": "cd packages/ui && pnpm storybook"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@axe-core/playwright": "^4.11.0",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.56.1",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.5",
    "auto-playwright": "^1.16.1",
    "prettier": "^3.2.4",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "turbo": "^2.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@10.23.0",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0",
    "pnpm": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "pnpm": {
    "overrides": {
      "hono": ">=4.10.3",
      "esbuild": ">=0.25.0",
      "playwright": ">=1.55.1",
      "glob": ">=10.5.0"
    }
  }
}
